name: Cuberic
description:
Welcome to cuberic!                    

Right now there are just levels where you need to dodge the obstacles by sliding left or right.

This game is in beta 1.1.1

new features in beta 1.1: coins, shop where you can buy colors to player, progress counter and bug fixes!

1.1.1 : Bug fix

Some features that are planned is: endless mode, shop, more level, music and sound effects.

You are welcome to send your suggestions and feedback via mail: hebshoy@gmail.com !
